articles.description: The Utahraptor, the world's largest "raptor" dinosaur, is now estimated to be 135 million years old, 10 million years older than previously thought. The discovery has important implications for dinosaur evolutionary history and narrows the gap in the rock rec…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of KansasMay 7, 2023
